remarks: Value of the category of non-unital rings (in a universe).  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rngcval.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcval.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcval.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Rng ) ) $.
rngcval.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RngHomo |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
rngcval $p |- ( ph -> C = ( ( ExtStrCat ` U ) |`cat H ) ) $.
